summary: Completed comprehensive testing of clinical anamnesis application. Backend API fully functional (100% success rate), frontend UI loads correctly, but frontend-backend authentication integration has issues preventing full e2e testing.

fixed_during_testing.issue: DateTime comparison error in session validation
fixed_during_testing.fix_applied: Added proper timezone handling for session expiration checks

integration_issues.issue: Frontend cannot authenticate with backend despite API working correctly
integration_issues.symptoms: Console shows 401 errors, user stays on login page
integration_issues.details: API works with both Authorization header and Cookie via curl, but browser requests fail with 401

critical: Fix frontend-backend authentication integration - API works but browser auth fails with 401 errors
Investigate cookie/CORS configuration for browser-based authentication
Test Google OAuth flow end-to-end once auth integration is fixed
medium: Verify wizard form validation and step navigation
Test anamnese detail view and export buttons in browser
